title: It should be bannable to pick 5 ad team comps...
body:
WHEN UR AD CARRY IS CAITLYN....AGAINST TANKS...

Im really tired of ppl on my team picking lee sin, darius and nasus mid when i fking first pick caitlyn...Like holy shit.

Yeah its fun being useless cause all the other team has to do is pick a tank and build cinder + thornmail so its an auto loss.
